content.body:
> <@abotella:igalia.com> does anyone know if WPT has tests for `
` and ``? see https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/2291 and back references listed there, looks like at least a couple of relevant tests (but the tests might be wrong)
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @abotella:igalia.com
does anyone know if WPT has tests for <br> and <wbr>?
see https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/2291 and back references listed there, looks like at least a couple of relevant tests (but the tests might be wrong)
